title: Sharp Aquos R7 launches w/ huge 1-inch 47.2MP sensor, 240Hz AMOLED display
content:
While not often available outside of a few selected markets, Sharp has officially unveiled the Aquos R7, which touts a massive 1-inch rear 47.2-megapixel camera sensor and an upgraded 240Hz AMOLED display.

moreâ€¦

The post Sharp Aquos R7 launches w/ huge 1-inch 47.2MP sensor, 240Hz AMOLED display appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Japanese tech giant Sharp has unveiled the Aquos R7, which comes with a whopping 1-inch 47.2-megapixel camera system and much more.
